document_data.name: Flame of Hope
document_data.mainbody: The '''Flame of Hope''' was a business located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].[[Eric L. Boyd]] (June 2005). '''''City of Splendors: Waterdeep'''''. ([[Wizards of the Coast]]), p. 107. ISBN [[Special:BookSources/0-7869-3693-2|0-7869-3693-2]].
document_data.Description: The building stood two stories tall.
document_data.Activities: Run by the candle artisan Jastra Blynthard, this shop offers all her creations as well as complementary items to shed light. <ref># [[Ed Greenwood]] and [[Steven E. Schend]] (July 1994). “Campaign Guide”. '''''City of Splendors''''' ([[TSR, Inc]]), p. 92. ISBN [[Special:BookSources/0-5607-6868-1|0-5607-6868-1]].
document_data.Location: The Flame of Hope was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]] on [[Tulmaster's Street]] at the mouth of [[Sethma's Court]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Adventurers' Quarter}}
